original: 東萊長廣人。原為海賊，聚眾三千餘人做亂，被曹操遣樂進、李典打敗後，逃入海島。曹操採納何夔之計，命郡丞黃珍勸降管承。
text: Donglai Changguang people. Originally a pirate, he gathered more than 3,000 people to make chaos. After Cao Cao sent Lejin and Li Dian defeated him, he fled to the island. Cao Cao adopted He Kui's plan and ordered Huang Zhen, the county prime minister, to persuade him to surrender.
